main: 500g Coles Australian No Added Hormones 3 Star Regular Beef Mince
50g pkt Coles Mexico Chile Con Carne Seasoning
1 small (about 200g) red capsicum, seeded, finely chopped

methods.Step 1: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Place the taco shellsUnsure of the quantity needed?Click on the underlined ingredient to reveal the quantity. No need to flip back and forth!OK, Got It (8 Coles Hard Taco Shells) on a large baking tray. Bake for 5 mins or until heated through.
methods.Step 2: Meanwhile, add the mince (500g Coles Australian No Added Hormones 3 Star Regular Beef Mince) to a non-stick frying pan over high heat. Cook, stirring, for 5 mins or until the mince changes colour. Add the chile con carne seasoning (50g pkt Coles Mexico Chile Con Carne Seasoning) and 3/4 cup (185ml) water. Cook, stirring, for 5 mins or until the mince mixture thickens.
methods.Step 3: Divide the taco shells among serving plates. Fill taco shells with the mince mixture, lettuce (2 cups Coles Shredded Iceberg Lettuce) and capsicum (1 small (about 200g) red capsicum, seeded, finely chopped).
